sentences.sContent: The film contains moments of almost unbearable poignancy.
sentences.sCn: 电影中有几段令人无法承受的辛酸情节。

words.tran: 尖锐的；辛酸的；深刻的；切中要害的
深刻地；辛辣地；令人辛酸地

trans.tranCn: 辛酸(事) 强烈, 尖刻, 辛辣
trans.tranOther: Poignancy is the quality that something has when it affects you deeply and makes you feel very sad
